title: ICE on Stable: failed to lift QueryResult

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Stable Rust 1.27.2 ICE'd with the following error: ```rust error: internal compiler error: librustc/infer/canonical.rs:695: failed to lift `QueryResult { var_values: CanonicalVarValues { var_values: ['?0, '?1] }, region_constraints: [Binder(OutlivesPredicate(ReStatic, '?0))], certainty: Proven, value: NormalizationResult { normalized_ty: std::vec::Vec } }`, canonicalized from `QueryResult { var_values: CanonicalVarValues { var_values: ['_#0r, '_#1r] }, region_constraints: [Binder(OutlivesPredicate(ReStatic, '_#0r))], certainty: Proven, value: NormalizationResult { normalized_ty: _ } }` ``` On Nightly compiles successfully. **I tried the following code:** [Playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?gist=2f7d5bd6038ab10c936efdebddf92212&version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2015) (sorry, I can't make smaller bug-reproducible code snippet 🙁) **Meta:** * 1.27.2 (58cc626de 2018-07-18) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu * 1.29.0-nightly (54628c8ea 2018-07-30) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
Backtrace:

``` thread 'main' panicked at 'Box', librustc_errors/lib.rs:554:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace at libstd/sys/unix/backtrace/tracing/gcc_s.rs:49 1: std::sys_common::backtrace::print at libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:71 at libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:59 2: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}} at libstd/panicking.rs:211 3: std::panicking::default_hook at libstd/panicking.rs:227 4: rustc::util::common::panic_hook 5: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook at libstd/panicking.rs:467 6: std::panicking::begin_panic 7: rustc_errors::Handler::bug 8: rustc::session::opt_span_bug_fmt::{{closure}} 9: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_opt::{{closure}} 10: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_context_opt 11: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_opt 12: rustc::session::opt_span_bug_fmt 13: rustc::session::bug_fmt 14: rustc::infer::canonical::Canonicalizer::canonicalize 15: rustc_traits::util::make_query_response 16: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_related_context 17: rustc_traits::normalize_projection_ty::normalize_projection_ty 18: rustc::ty::maps:: for rustc::ty::maps::queries::normalize_projection_ty<'tcx>>::compute 19: rustc::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 20: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_related_context 21: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::>::force_query_with_job 22: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::>::get_query 23: as rustc::ty::fold::TypeFolder<'gcx, 'tcx>>::fold_ty 24: rustc::ty::fold::TypeFoldable::fold_with 25: core::ops::function::impls:: for &'a mut F>::call_once 26: rustc::ty::fold::TypeFoldable::fold_with 27: rustc::traits::query::normalize::>::normalize 28: rustc::infer::InferCtxt::commit_if_ok 29: rustc_mir::borrow_check::nll::type_check::TypeChecker::normalize 30: as rustc::mir::visit::Visitor<'tcx>>::visit_constant 31: as rustc::mir::visit::Visitor<'tcx>>::visit_mir 32: rustc_mir::borrow_check::nll::type_check::type_check_internal 33: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_related_context 34: rustc::infer::InferCtxtBuilder::enter 35: ::run_pass 36: rustc_mir::transform::mir_const::{{closure}} 37: rustc_mir::transform::mir_const 38: rustc::ty::maps:: for rustc::ty::maps::queries::mir_const<'tcx>>::compute 39: rustc::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 40: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_related_context 41: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::>::force_query_with_job 42: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::>::get_query 43: rustc::ty::maps::>::mir_const 44: rustc_mir::transform::mir_validated 45: rustc::ty::maps:: for rustc::ty::maps::queries::mir_validated<'tcx>>::compute 46: rustc::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 47: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_related_context 48: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::>::force_query_with_job 49: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::>::get_query 50: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::>::ensure_query 51: rustc_borrowck::borrowck::borrowck 52: rustc::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 53: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_related_context 54: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::>::force_query_with_job 55: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::>::get_query 56: rustc_borrowck::borrowck::check_crate 57: rustc::ty::context::tls::enter_context 58: >::with 59: rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt::create_and_enter 60: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input 61: rustc_driver::run_compiler_impl 62: >::set 63: syntax::with_globals 64: as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once 65: __rust_maybe_catch_panic at libpanic_unwind/lib.rs:105 66: rustc_driver::run 67: rustc_driver::main 68: std::rt::lang_start::{{closure}} 69: std::panicking::try::do_call at libstd/rt.rs:59 at libstd/panicking.rs:310 70: __rust_maybe_catch_panic at libpanic_unwind/lib.rs:105 71: std::rt::lang_start_internal at libstd/panicking.rs:289 at libstd/panic.rs:374 at libstd/rt.rs:58 72: main 73: __libc_start_main 74: query stack during panic: #0 [normalize_projection_ty] normalizing `Canonical { variables: Slice([ CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Region }, CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Region } ]), value: ParamEnvAnd { param_env: ParamEnv { caller_bounds: Slice([]), reveal: UserFacing }, value: ProjectionTy { substs: Slice([ std::iter::Map ]), item_def_id: DefId(2/0:1918 ~ core[cde8]::iter[0]::iterator[0]::Iterator[0]::Item[0]) } } }` #1 [mir_const] processing `find_saddle_points` #2 [mir_validated] processing `find_saddle_points` #3 [borrowck] processing `find_saddle_points` end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error ```
